Relaxed Richardson Solver

Contents

  • Code

Relaxed Richardson SolverÂ¶

Iterative solver for the equation

\[Ax = b\]

with

\[A\in\mathbb{R}^{n\times n },x\in\mathbb{R}^n ,b\in\mathbb{R}^n\]

which can be transformed to:

\[x_{k+1} = x_k - \theta (A{x_k}-b)\]

.

src.relaxedrichardson_iterativesolver.richardson(A, b, x0, theta=0.1, maxiter=500, tol=1e-08)[source]Â¶

Relaxed Richardson iterative solver.

Parameters

  • A (csr_matrix) -- Invertible matrix.

  • b (list) -- Vector.

  • x0 (list) -- Start vector.

  • theta (float, optional) -- Relaxation. The default is .1.

  • maxiter (int, optional) -- Max. number of iteration. The default is 500.

  • tol (float, optional) -- Error tolerance. The default is 1e-08.

Returns

  • x (list) -- Vector; current iteration/ approximated solution.

  • error (list) -- Contains all residues.

  • numiter (int) -- Number of iterations.

CodeÂ¶

 1from src import csrmatrix as csr, linalg as la, unitymatrix as uni, tridiagtoep as tri
 2
 3def richardson(A, b, x0, theta=.1, maxiter=500, tol=1e-08):
 4"""Relaxed Richardson iterative solver.
 5
 6Parameters
 7----------
 8A : csr_matrix
 9    Invertible matrix.
10b : list
11    Vector.
12x0 : list
13    Start vector.
14theta : float, optional
15    Relaxation. The default is .1.
16maxiter : int, optional
17    Max. number of iteration. The default is 500.
18tol : float, optional
19    Error tolerance. The default is 1e-08.
20
21Returns
22-------
23x : list
24    Vector; current iteration/ approximated solution.
25error : list
26    Contains all residues.
27numiter : int
28    Number of iterations.
29
30"""
31error = []        #for residues
32numiter = -1
33x = x0
34
35if A.shape[1] == la.vecdim(b):               #if condition: only Matrix mxn and vector nx1 can be multiplied
36    while numiter <= maxiter:
37        x = la.axpy(la.axpy(b, A@x , -1), x, - theta)     #x-theta(Ax-b) <=> -theta(-b+Ax)+x
38        residuum = la.nrm(la.axpy(b, A@x , -1))
39        error = error + [residuum]
40        if residuum < tol:
41            break
42        numiter = numiter+1   #while loop until numiter=maxiter (or residuum < 0)
43else:
44    print("No solution. Shape of matrix (n) must confirm with dimension of vector.")
45
46return "x=", x, "error=", error, "numiter=", numiter
